EmailTemplate.description: This will be used by RNW(Future calling team)
EmailTemplate.name: Video Links
EmailTemplate.subject: QuickBooks Online- Get started with these Video Tutorials
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for evaluating QuickBooks Online. Please visit the video tutorial of Quickbooks to learn more.
You can also write us for more details.
